description.narrative: IR 2.1 By 2013, routine and supplementary immunisation services especially in areas with immunisation coverage below 50% are strengthened, which contributes to Immunization. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Developing And Leveraging Resources And Partnerships, Evaluations, Research And Data, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Programme Component Results (PCR) 2: Child and Maternal Mortality are reduced through more equitable access to quality health, nutrition and Water, Sanitation, and Hygiene (WASH) interventions

sector.narrative: Immunization supply chain, including cold chain

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents
